story_30_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
*sigh* In the end, our plot to sabotage the PML
never came to fruition...
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
And now Lear’s got most of our old team working
for him. So where do we go from here?
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Ain’t it obvious? We continue doin’ bad!
What else?
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Think about all the times we got up to no
good together. Weren’t those the best days
of your lives?
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Team Break taught us so much! We can’t just let
it end like that, right?!
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah! I miss those days! I just wanna feel like
that again!
story_30_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Right?! This ain’t about holdin’ a grudge against
Lear anymore!
story_30_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Team Break is breakin’ out! We make our own
rules—follow our own path!
story_30_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: I think I’m starting to see a path of my own...
